overview: In a world where about 8 in 10 people posses some kind of super power, Reineldis De La Cruz is a high school senior wanting to pursue hero work. In order to do so, a parental consent form is needed to allow any super children to attend a training academy.  Giselle, Reineldis' mother, has no intentions of letting her attend. However, a normal trip to the salon changes everything.
title: Check YES!
